page_subtitle: Access the exact systems, scripts, and strategies we use to create viral emotional storytelling content.
free_section_subtitle: Get started with our proven frameworks at no cost.
premium_description: Get complete access to our entire library of 169 professionally written scripts, plus all video elements, thumbnail briefs, and commercial licensing rights.

faq.question: What format are the scripts in?
faq.answer: All scripts are delivered as Word documents (.docx) that work with Word 2007 and newer. They include complete dialogue, scene descriptions, and emotional beats clearly marked.

faq.question: Can I use these scripts on my YouTube channel?
faq.answer: Yes! All products include a commercial license allowing you to create videos from the scripts and monetize them on your YouTube channel. The license is for single-channel use.

faq.question: Do I need special software for the prompts?
faq.answer: No special software needed. Our prompts work with any AI tool including ChatGPT, Claude, and others. Just copy, paste, and add your story details.

faq.question: Is there a refund policy?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all products. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.

faq.question: How do I access my purchase?
faq.answer: After purchase, you'll receive an email with download links. You'll also get access to your personal dashboard where all your products are available anytime.
